articles.description: Katie, from Edinburgh, brought £3,000 back to the prize fund.
articles.content:
On last night's The Chase, a Scot took on Chaser Jenny Ryan but her fellow contestant made a dig at her, despite making it back to the team.
Katie, 31, from Edinburgh, made it through the cash build… [+1748 chars]
